item.title: [pwnme 2023 - crypto] Scream Like Viking
item.description: [pwnme 2023 - crypto] Scream Like Viking Our protagonist John is in a room, he hears some kind of noise, like something resonating. But he doesn’t understand it… Perhaps he could play with his own echoes to guess what the meaning of this famous resonance could be… nc 51.68.95.78 32773 Scream Like Viking" This article is a write-up for “Scream Like Viking”, a cryptography challenge from PwnMe 2023.
